Package org.klotski.coding

Class HighScoreUpdater

java.lang.Object
org.klotski.coding.HighScoreUpdater
public class HighScoreUpdater extends Object
HighScoreUpdater get the Best score for all the users and update them if necessary.
It stores elements in a Map with user as the key
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Andrea Mutti, Alessandro Girlanda, Alba Casanica, Matteo Meneghin

    • addUserScore

      public void addUserScore(String user, int score)
      Adds a user and its relative high score to the map
      Parameters:
      user - The selected user
      score - The user's score

    • hasUsers

      public boolean hasUsers()
      Check if there are users stored
      Returns:
      True if the map isn't empty, false otherwise

    • isInside

      public boolean isInside(String user)
      Check if a user is inside the map
      Parameters:
      user - The user to search
      Returns:
      True if there's the user associated with a key, false otherwise

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore(String user, int score)
      Update a user's score if there's the user in the list
      Parameters:
      user - The selected user
      score - The score to update
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If there is no user in the map
      See Also:
      • writeScore()

      Parameters:

      Returns:
